Desc.eng: What are you doing there, sniffing like bloodhound?
This puddle is of the same substance that the Dark Alchemist unleashed on the town. Smells good, doesn’t it?
Tell me you are not really trying to…
...taste it? But I’m experimenting! It’s all the rage in Borgova.
…taste it? Of course not. It might turn me into a turtle or whatnot.
